alert.note: Alert for Mendocino (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 27 at 7:57AM PST by NWS Eureka
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM PST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding of highway 1 caused by excessive rainfall is expected in the Garcia River drainage. * WHERE...A portion of northwest California, including the following county, southwestern Mendocino at the Garcia River. * WHEN...Until 900 AM PST. * IMPACTS...Flooding of highway 1 at the Garcia river is imminent or occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 750 AM PST, River gauges indicated flooding on highway 1 is imminent. Highway 1 at the Garcia river may be closed due to flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... highway 1 will be closed in Southwestern Mendocino County - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
